messages.subject: "Swastika" Tsuba
messages.msgSnippet: I uploaded a .gif of what my tsuba looks like. The white space is all open and the brownish colored areas are what makes up the tsuba. In other words, the
messages.messageBody:
I uploaded a .gif of what my tsuba looks like. The white space is all
open and the brownish colored areas are what makes up the tsuba. In
other words, the symbols aren't carved into the tsuba, they are
actually what makes up the tsuba. Anyone seen something like this?
